text: “hari api mehen yamu” kiyamin ohu aya wenath paththakata kandawa gena giyeya.

mahanuwara nugawela pirimi maha widuhala, balangoda waligepola somadewi prathamika widuhala ha walagamba maha widuhale widuhale sisu sisuwiyan desiya panahakata adhika pirisak da kisiyam aasathmikathawak hethuwen eeye (16) rohalgatha kara thibe.nugawela pirimi maha widuhale sisun desiyak pamana thiththapajjala jayawikrama paryantha rohalatath, waligepola somadewi prathamika widuhale sisu sisuwiyan haththa dedenaku ha walagamba maha widuhale sisun pasdenaku waligepola rajaye rohalatath mese athulath kota thibe.sirura kasima, palu mathuwima, klanthaya, husma ganime apahasuthawa wani roga lakshana hethuwen me sisu sisuwiyan rohalgatha kara atha.

pawathina kalambaum sahagatha deshapalana thaththwaya nowisandunahoth agosthu masaye sita thaman swadhina kandayamak lesa kriyakirimata sudanamin sitina bawa janapathiwaraya hamuwu shri lanka nidahas pakshaye manthriwarun prakasha kara atha. ← pakisthanaye balukisthanhi wisipahak ekathana modita gini keli →
esema, nirantharayenma siduwana amarikanu – koriyanu kenehilikam nisa, kisiwaku amanognya thiranayak gathahoth, nawatha lokaya yuddhayaka patalimata boho idakada thibenawa.
“ape mathaya nam ee nusudusukama me wyawasthawe simawa iwath kirimen iwathwela naha.
heta bonna gena bothal tika (tika kiwwata ekayi ) adama bonawa ehenam !

diwayine pawathwena paranithama pasal maha krikat tharaga atharin dewani sthanaya himikara ganna mema maha krikat tharagaya dina thunak pura pawathwena maha krikat tharagawalin ekakda weyi.
ee kiyanne sihina ayiya dina dekak pamana basaya wada kale naththeda eeta pasuwa ape gedarata paminiyeda oya kala wakawanuwala bawa mata watahuni.
ee thula apita penawa shri lanka nidahas pakshaya pilibandawa me rate sulu jathin thula balaporoththuwak thiyenawa.
eken karanne netwark athara
ee karana kese wethath, undage guna kotiyayi.
dan honda awasthawak thiyanawa.
owuhu ahimiwu dashakayangen pida windithi.”

hatan – dikoya nagara sabha balapradeshayata ayath hatan, nagara sabhawe adhikshanaya yatathe pawathwagena yana, hatan tharu chathurashraye pihiti mahajana wasikiliye mala apadrawya rathri kalayedi hatan nagaraya osse gala basina pradhana kanu paddhathiyata muda harima kalaka sita sidukerena bawath, mema katayuththa itha sukshama ayurin sanwidhanathmakawa sidukarana athara, masayakata pamana warak madhyama rathriyata aasanna welawanhidi kamkaruwan kihipadenek yoda ganimin baldi upayogi karaganimin meya kanu paddhathiyata muda harina bawath owuhu pawasathi.
